law.catch_line: Expiration of coalbed methane well permit -- Extension of permit term.

text.section: The extension of the permit term pursuant to subsection (1) of this section shall not create a right to object to the coalbed methane well location under KRS 349.020 nor to mediation under KRS 353.5901.

law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 27, effective July 13, 2004.
